summary: THE FRONT SEATS WERE NOT CENTERED CORRECTLY, THEY WERE POSITIONED TO THE RIGHT OF THE CENTER. CONSUMER WAS CONCERNED IF THE AIR BAGS SHOULD DEPLOY, THE DRIVER WOULD NOT BE PROTECTED.  (THE OTHER VEHICLE IS A CHEVROLET TAHOE 2002.  VIN: [XXX]) *JG  *JB    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
